Params: {2: 'Mother', 3: 'Look at my lovely son and daughter! Oh, they look absolutely fabulous...'}
{2: 'Father', 3: "Liv, why aren't you dressed up yet?"}
{2: 'Mother', 3: "She's not been well, and she doesn't like crowds, right, Liv?"}
{2: 'Liv', 3: '...I can stay back and take care of our home.'}
{2: 'Mother', 3: 'The child likes to be somewhere calm and quiet, so just let her be.'}
{2: 'Father', 3: "Sigh, this child is too absorbed in her own world, I hope she's not been too much trouble."}
{2: 'Mother', 3: "Oh heavens no! I've always treated her as my own... How could she be trouble?"}
{2: 'Father', 3: "Then Liv, you can stay at home and rest. It's about time as well, you and the children go get ready. I'll have to be at the dinner first."}
